data.headline: Junior DevOps Engineer and Researcher
data.summary: Passionate junior DevOps engineer with a strong academic background in computer science. Experienced in automating infrastructure and deploying applications using various DevOps tools and methodologies. Eager to contribute to innovative projects and continuously improve processes.

experience.title: Junior DevOps Engineer
bullets: Automated infrastructure provisioning and application deployment using Ansible and Terraform
Implemented Kubernetes clusters and managed containerized applications
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins
Monitored and troubleshot production environments using logging and monitoring tools

projects.name: Automated Infrastructure Provisioning
projects.description: Designed and implemented an automated infrastructure provisioning system using Terraform and Ansible to deploy and manage cloud resources for a web application.

projects.name: Kubernetes Cluster Management
projects.description: Developed and maintained a Kubernetes cluster to deploy and manage containerized applications, including setting up monitoring, logging, and scaling mechanisms.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Aditi Sharma, a young woman with dark hair wearing a blue collared shirt, smiling confidently at the camera.
